dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: S.P.D. You call yourself a Butler? I'll demonstrate, so just shut up and watch. It's all about the Speed, Precision, and Decisiveness...

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Butlers must always start their mornings two hours before their Master does. Get them all out of bed, even if you have to beat them up.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามกลางวัน
dataList.dlg: What the hell is the Kitchen staff doing? Our employers' luncheon has been delayed by 5 minutes. This is completely unacceptable. Any more delay, and I'll S.S.Y.N.C. Is that what you want?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Make sure that your forks and knives are well-whetted. Everything truly enjoyable about being a Butler happens during the 'night watch' missions... heh.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
I personally detest having to talk more than I have to, but... this sloppy work deserves proper scolding.
Haah... Chief Butler is quite an exhausting job.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
Look at this mess inside your case. How will you find your utensils in case of an emergency? Unbelievable...
I'll give you another demonstration of how to organize your case. The entire process. For the seventh time...

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
The hunt is nigh. This time, our target is... well, I don't like that he's an old acquaintance of mine...
Tsk. But this is something I have to do myself. You there. Were you able to get in touch with Gregor?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
Pull back! He's... Tsk, this is hard to explain. Return to the manor and finish your cleaning duties. Your less-than-ineffective attacks are hardly any help anyway.
... I'll deal with him myself.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
So this is how we meet again... What a bizarre feeling this is. As the Chief Butler, I must say that this isn't the kind of reunion I hoped you'd bring.
I'll throw you one hell of a homecoming party, though. Heh.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Quit zoning out and whet your knives. Haah... how many times must I repeat myself?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Very well. It's about time we put an end to this, Heathcliff. Because you're... my 'housekeeping chore' to take care of.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Ready, as per that foolish Master's orders.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Hunting cutlery's at the ready.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Quit it with your idiotic bravado and take cover behind me, you fool of a Master.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Headed out for a combat reception.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Get ready to close your eyes...

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Tch…

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Go enjoy your dream. Now.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Cough... I have to... protect my fool of a Master...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Hmph, housekeeping complete.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Well, this was beyond my obligations anyway. Suffer the consequences of your decision.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: If the 'housekeeping' is complete... let us return shortly. Don't stay up too late. I'll S.Y.N.C if I see that our morning duties were sloppily carried out.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: That was a successful combat reception. Your moves weren't half bad... Now let us return to other 'housekeeping' work.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: This hunt was a failure... There is so much that must be addressed. Not only the Butlers, but also... that fool of a Master. They'll need some re-education.
